Bash(cd "C:\\College\\Hacklytics_2026\\ml" && python -m scripts.project_market_impact \\
  --master_csv global_tariff_impact_master.csv \\
  --use_yfinance false \\
  --seed 42 \\
  --jump_lambda 1.0 \\
  --jump_mu -0.02 \\
  --jump_sigma 0.08 \\
  --bottom_day 12 \\
  --recovery_fraction 0.5 \\
  --tau 20 \\
  --out_dir outputs 2>&1)

Bash(cd "C:\\College\\Hacklytics_2026\\ml" && python -c "
from pathlib import Path
required = [
    'outputs/index_paths.csv',
    'outputs/sector_paths.csv',
    'outputs/stock_paths.csv',
    'outputs/plots/sp500_90d.png',
    'outputs/plots/nasdaq100_90d.png',
    'outputs/plots/dow_90d.png',
    'outputs/plots/sectors_top10_overview.png',
]
sector_plots = list\(Path\('outputs/plots/sectors'\).glob\('*_top10_90d.png'\)\)
sector_csvs  = list\(Path\('outputs/sectors'\).glob\('*_top10.csv'\)\)

for f in required:
    p = Path\(f\)
    print\(f'  {\\"OK\\" if p.exists\(\) else \\"MISSING\\":6s} {f}'\)
print\(f'  OK     {len\(sector_plots\)} sector plots in outputs/plots/sectors/'\)
print\(f'  OK     {len\(sector_csvs\)} per-sector CSVs in outputs/sectors/'\)

# Spot-check CSV columns
import pandas as pd
idx = pd.read_csv\('outputs/index_paths.csv'\)
stk = pd.read_csv\('outputs/stock_paths.csv'\)
sec = pd.read_csv\('outputs/sector_paths.csv'\)
print\(\)
print\('index_paths.csv    cols:', list\(idx.columns\)\)
print\('stock_paths.csv    cols:', list\(stk.columns\)\)
print\('sector_paths.csv   cols:', list\(sec.columns\)\)
print\('stock_paths rows:', len\(stk\), '  unique tickers:', stk['ticker'].nunique\(\)\)
" 2>&1)
Bash(cd "C:\\College\\Hacklytics_2026\\ml" && python -m scripts.project_market_impact --master_csv global_tariff_impact_master.csv --use_yfinance false --seed 42 --out_dir outputs 2>&1)
